channel.title: caddy on Andrew Zah
channel.description: Recent content in caddy on Andrew Zah

item.title: Automatically deploy your blog via Git with Caddy and Docker
item.author: zah@andrewzah.com (Andrew Zah)
item.description: Over the years, I’ve incrementally optimized my blog. I used to use an entire rails setup with postgres, because that was the first thing I learned… Yet that’s quite the overkill for a blog with static content.

item.title: Selfhosting git with Gitea, Docker, Caddy
item.author: zah@andrewzah.com (Andrew Zah)
item.description: Something I’ve been doing recently is starting to self-host as much as I can. I don’t like relying on businesses, since they can change their services on a whim.
